About Me

Data Scientist with two years of experience developing amazing Data Products and researches.

Implementing NLP models, recommendation models, analysis, researches, experiments and A/B tests for customer service.

As member of the Data Science chapter, I helped define several data science processes used by data scientists across Sicredi (eg. Model Cards, documentations, etc.).

In my free time, I’m a CS:GO and Age of Empires player. :)
